title: 111_s203
content: Strengthening the Visa Waiver Program to Secure America Act - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act regarding the visa waiver program to: (1) require current and new program countries to report on lost or stolen visas in order to participate in the program. (2) set a maximum 2 visa overstay rate for program countries, (3) require a reevaluation of program countries within one year. And (4) include arrival data in the required air entry and exit system and electronic travel authorization system.
